title: Hol-U19: Edit/delete/view/send Mail？
answer:
Main menu->Email->input user ID and password.

Account setting:

1. Manual：

Input ID and password->POP3àInter the server setting interfaceàedit the POP3 serveràNextàsetting the send SMTP serverànextàsetting the frequency of sync mailànext->setting the mail as prompt.

2. Auto

Input ID and password->Next->Mail setting->finish.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140928171520741001.png)

Delete the account:

**Email**-> Menu->settings, press the account you want to editàRemove account.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140928171521257002.jpg)
